title: v0.1.0: WSL NiFi Dev Platform with CAI
description:
WSL-based InfoMetis NiFi development platform augmented with Collaborative AI (CAI) pipeline creation automation

Key Components:
- NiFi deployment on WSL using kind (Kubernetes in Docker)
- Traefik ingress for UI access
- Simple collaborative AI pipeline creation support
- Complete user documentation
- Zero-install architecture

This milestone represents InfoMetis Service Orchestration Platform's first deliverable.

title: v0.2.0: NiFi Registry with Git Integration
description:
Add NiFi Registry with Git version control integration to InfoMetis platform

Key Components:
- NiFi Registry deployment for pipeline version control
- Git integration for pipeline versioning and backup
- Enhanced CAI pipeline version management through AI interface
- Version-controlled pipeline creation and management

Builds on v0.1.0 foundation to add comprehensive pipeline governance and collaboration capabilities.

title: v0.3.0: Elasticsearch Integration
description:
Add Elasticsearch for search and analytics to InfoMetis platform

Key Components:
- Elasticsearch deployment for search and analytics
- NiFi → Elasticsearch data flow integration
- Enhanced CAI for search and analytics pipeline creation
- Data indexing and search pipeline patterns

Builds on v0.2.0 Registry capabilities to add comprehensive data search and analytics functionality.

title: v0.5.0: Kafka Streaming Integration
description:
Add Kafka for message streaming and event processing to InfoMetis platform

Key Components:
- Kafka deployment for message streaming and event processing
- Kafka → NiFi → Elasticsearch → Grafana streaming integration
- Enhanced CAI for event-driven pipeline creation
- Real-time streaming and event processing patterns

Completes the core processing unit with full streaming capabilities across all platform services.

title: v0.4.0: Grafana Monitoring and Visualization
description:
Add Grafana for monitoring and visualization to InfoMetis platform

Key Components:
- Grafana deployment for monitoring and visualization
- NiFi + Elasticsearch → Grafana dashboard integration
- Enhanced CAI for dashboard and monitoring pipeline creation
- Automated monitoring and alerting pipeline patterns

Builds on v0.3.0 Elasticsearch capabilities to add comprehensive monitoring and operational intelligence.
